channel.title: Help with server please!
channel.description: Hi, im Ringed, i need help with hosting a server, i've traced the problem to either a hardrive problem or a source, (most likely a combination of two). Its that people can connect easily and normally one click to my serv sometimes, but then after a little while, they have to click hundreds of times to get in. i dont know whats wrong, my servers on all the time. If it matters at all i use a dell.

item.title: Help with server please!
item.dc:creator: @balla balla
item.description:
@balla wrote:

uhh that happens to me to its ur virtual memory geting low to solve u can get a restarter or just like every 4 hours or so restart ur computer =)

Read full topic
